snippet.title: Magic City Detective: Wings of Revenge Trailer
snippet.description:
Domini Games presents the first chapter in a brand-new series of modern magical fantasy with Magic City Detective: Wings of Revenge.

Your friend Ymir has invited you to join the festivities at the annual Venice masquerade, but there’s more to Ymir and this masquerade than meets the eye. You see, Ymir is an elf, and this event is the one time each year that she and her friends can walk amongst humans without revealing the secret world of magical creatures! Unfortunately, someone is determined to ruin the party by revealing their secret to the world! Step into the shoes of a magic detective to unravel the case before the world discovers the truth. The world of magic is counting on you in this fantastic new Hidden-Object Puzzle Adventure game!

Download the Free Trial for PC!
https://www.bigfishgames.com/games/12419/magic-city-detective-wings-of-revenge-ce/

Available Now
